childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: I am a Product Manager and Software Engineer leveraging my diverse background to design and deliver quality software solutions in the Live Engagement industry. Drawing on over a decade of consulting and business analysis skills, I have a passion for combining my consulting, technical, and product experience to create compelling products that are fun to use. My experience is heavily weighted in the Software as a Service (SaaS) space where I have had the opportunity to function and succeed in many roles including consulting, project management, product management, engineering, sales engineering, and more. In my current role at Vee24 as Senior Director of Product, I serve as a key bridge-point between Engineering, Client Success, Marketing, and Sales.
